patterns_discovered: Comprehensive Compose UI testing using Robolectric
Systematic test coverage for emoji selection and display
Use of MaterialTheme in test setup
Test cases covering edge cases like empty reactions and multiple reactions
gotchas_discovered: Handling complex emojis like ZWJ sequences and flag emojis
Displaying reaction counts only when more than one sender exists
Testing both sent and received message reaction displays
recommendations: Consider performance testing for large reaction lists
Potentially add accessibility tests for reaction components
